name: You're Toast!
description:
Created by Kalan Miurrelle, Jamie Zhang, and Nadia Kurihara for the 2017 San Diego Game Jam

The game has two phases, the trap placement phase and the racing phase.  During the trap phase, players will take turn placing traps.  Some of the traps are mimics.  The players then race to see who can get to school the fastest.

credit to beek for making the amazing background music!
